data.name: Dark Cravings
data.detailed_description:
Game titles available in Dark Cravings include:

1. Maid in the Manor
(Victorian horror, item-based puzzle, exorcism)
Play as a maid hired to clean a haunted manor filled with monsters and supernatural entities.
Will you keep to your own business and leave the cursed place with a handsome pay (for your immaculate cleaning service), or will your curiosity get the best of you?

2. My Ex-GF Made Me Dinner
(Psychological horror, anime pixel, conversation choice)
Your ex-girlfriend came to visit you out of a sudden and unannounced. She is armed with cooking skills that would make anyone drool. What exactly is she up to now? Will you be able to find out her true intention and survive her cooking? Or will you succumb to the horror-bly delicious dishes being served to you?

3. Office Paranormal
(Urban legend, platformer, dimension portal)
Things are missing from your office. Your colleagues are getting pissed and your boss is mad. Something is clearly wrong at the office. And who else can get it fixed but you. Office Paranormal is a horror platformer that will test your skill in many ways.

Note: The standard version comes with the 3 titles above. The developer hopes to add more horror-filled titles into the collection in the near future.

data.short_description: Dark Cravings is a collection of pixel horror adventure titles to satisfy your deepest and darkest cravings.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: Intel or AMD multicore processor
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c support

content_descriptors.notes: Excessive cartoon violence, blood and gore. Includes gruesome depictions on foods
